natural_language_question: Which papers did the author Gennady L. Andrienko write?

sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX openalex: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX orcid: <https://orcid.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE { ?answer openalex:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship openalex:hasAuthor ?author . ?author orcid:orcidId "https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6942-0589" . }

natural_language_question: Which publications did W. Wu author?
Which papers did Richard Bowden publish in the last eight years?
List the papers published by Neil McGlohon in the last 5 years.

FILTER(?y > YEAR(NOW())-5) }

natural_language_question: Report the average number of publications by P. Melin per year.

sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX semoa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbo: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(?y) AS ?count) WHERE { ?x semoa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship dbo:orcidId <https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4066-3111> . ?x semoa:hasAuthor ?y . } GROUP BY ?y }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for papers published by Michael Vynnycky?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX semopenalex: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX orcid: <https://orcid.org/> PREFIX dbo: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(?y) AS ?count) WHERE { ?x semopenalex:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship dbo:orcidId orcid:0000-0002-8318-1251 . ?x semopenalex:hasAuthor ?y . } GROUP BY ?y }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for research papers published by Ivica L.?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX orcid: <https://orcid.org/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(?y) AS ?count) WHERE { ?x oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:orcidId orcid:0000-0003-3560-4288 . ?x oa:hasAuthor ?y . } GROUP BY ?x }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for papers published by P. R. S. Mendon\u00E7a?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX orcid: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(?author) AS ?count) WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship orcid: "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4025-4083" . ?work oa:hasAuthor ?author . } GROUP BY ?work }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for research papers published by Gustaf S\u00F6derlind?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX orcid: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(?coauthor) AS ?count) WHERE { ?paper oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor <https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3559-960X> . ?paper oa:hasAuthorship ?coauthorship . ?coauthorship oa:hasAuthor ?coauthor . FILTER (?coauthor != <https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3559-960X>) } GROUP BY ?paper }

natural_language_question: List the titles of the papers that Nikolay M. Safyannikov published and in which venues.
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX semoa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dbo: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?firstanswer ?secondanswer WHERE { ?x semoa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship dbo:orcidId "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5424-0881" . ?x semoa:hasLocation ?firstanswer . ?x dcterms:title ?secondanswer . }

natural_language_question: Which papers did author Gerard J. M. Janssen publish and in which year?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> PREFIX openalex: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbo: <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?firstanswer ?secondanswer WHERE { ?firstanswer openalex:hasAuthorship|openalex:hasAuthor ?authorship . ?authorship dbo:orcidId <https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5423-4468> . ?firstanswer fabio:hasPublicationYear ?secondanswer . }
